channel.title: Cats
channel.description:
Alright guys, I was given the idea of making working cats. Thing is, I can't do it alone, and don't have a server to put it in. I also need a bit of help. I'll be doing quite a bit of it, but need someone to put it in a server.
Sorry little ones, takin the big boys here.
Needed: Someone to add the crap to a server; preferably someone who can upload the client.java to pass it around for progress reasons.
Also need helpers; people who have been around a while and know a thing or two.
Person adding it to the server: -
Helpers: wasabiie Dead Man Hunter spankjava -
Person adding it: Please tell me what server you'll be adding it to.

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

i made a cat system back before the restart ill give it ago

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Man_Hunter Dead Man Hunter
item.description:
@Dead_Man_Hunter wrote:

761 - Kitten - A friendly little pet. 762 - Kitten - A friendly little pet. 763 - Kitten - A friendly little pet. 764 - Kitten - A friendly little pet. 765 - Kitten - A friendly little pet. 766 - Kitten - A friendly little pet. 767 - Crate - Can I hear kittens? 768 - Cat - A fully grown feline. 769 - Cat - A fully grown feline. 770 - Cat - A fully grown feline. 771 - Cat - A fully grown feline. 772 - Cat - A fully grown feline. 773 - Cat - A fully grown feline. 774 - Overgrown cat - A friendly not-so little pet. 775 - Overgrown cat - A friendly not-so little pet. 776 - Overgrown cat - A friendly not-so little pet. 777 - Overgrown cat - A friendly not-so little pet. 778 - Overgrown cat - A friendly not-so little pet. 779 - Overgrown cat - A friendly not-so little pet.

Those are the cat ID’s so you’ll have to do proper codes for each one of them :S
Add me on the list…I wouldn’t mind helping

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Yes, I know, I can’t stand having improper messages.

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Man_Hunter Dead Man Hunter
item.description:
@Dead_Man_Hunter wrote:

But we want it to be more realistic

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Or, I could add this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == CAT ID) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "I have feelings too! Feed meh!"; }

Thanks though

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Man_Hunter Dead Man Hunter
item.description:
@Dead_Man_Hunter wrote:

Don’t forget to add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == CAT ID) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Meow!"; }

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Was to learn, Iki. Now people just want it done for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“wasabiie, post:17, topic:157890”]what about feeding it retard?
go spam other threads.[/quote]
Actually I think Eh Pretty Easy is right.
The command he posted is a dog.
When you’re just searching for a Cat ID you can just edit it.
You’re not learning something when people are giving everything to you and you’re not doing something.
This community was to learn.

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Dog")) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(98, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; }
Pnwed pls.

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @wasabiie wasabiie
item.description:
@wasabiie wrote:

can you originally put you cat down in mopar anyways? do you just click on it and use the npc id to make it pop up behind you? Doesn’t sound like a hard task, feeding it’s going to be the problem.

they still have the item ids in mopar client right? i think it’s just for making it follow you that would be client side.

and btw…I asked to help. but it seems you like to overlook us little guys.

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

[quote=“Cryme Time, post:4, topic:157890”][quote author=Waffles!! link=topic=215248.msg1877333#msg1877333 date=1194599696]
Grrrrrrrrrrrrr!!! I’ll make a cheap version, in which you only need to feed the cat, and it grows.
[/quote] Umn… ok if i help you with this does this mean im on the coolio list xD[/quote]

Whats with this cool list crap anyways?

Read full topic

item.title: Cats
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

[quote=“aftereffect, post:1, topic:157897”][quote author=Cryme Time link=topic=215248.msg1877328#msg1877328 date=1194599594]
How are you planning to do this? Handlers? or what. This won’t be an easy project because, for cats to react and follow the same way as runescape does… That will be clientside and serverside.
[/quote]That would be only server side, nothing to do with the client.[/quote]Nobody will know for sure. But how would the cat folow your exact steps? and fall back behind a fence? I think thats more client side.

Read full topic
